title: Moroccan Chicken Tagine
description: A classic Moroccan chicken tagine with preserved lemons and olives. Tender chicken slow-cooked with aromatic spices until falling off the bone.
descriptionAr: طاجين دجاج مغربي كلاسيكي بالحامض المسكر والزيتون. دجاج طري مطبوخ ببطء مع التوابل العطرية.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a tagine or heavy-bottomed pot over medium heat.
Add onions and garlic, cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add chicken pieces and sear on all sides until golden brown.
Mix in all spices: ginger, turmeric, paprika, cumin, pepper, and salt.
Add 1 cup water, cover, and simmer for 45 minutes.
Add preserved lemon and olives, continue cooking for 30 more minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and parsley before serving.
Serve hot with crusty bread or couscous.

title: Beef Kefta Tagine
description: Spiced Moroccan meatballs cooked in a rich tomato sauce with eggs. A popular street food and home comfort dish.
descriptionAr: كرات لحم متبلة مطبوخة في صلصة طماطم غنية مع البيض. طعام شعبي مغربي محبوب.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a bowl, mix ground beef with onion, garlic, herbs, and all spices.
Form the mixture into small meatballs, about the size of walnuts.
Heat olive oil in a tagine or skillet over medium heat.
Brown the meatballs on all sides, about 8 minutes.
Add crushed tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes.
Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into them.
Cover and cook until eggs are set, about 5-7 minutes.
Serve hot with Moroccan bread.

title: Vegetable Tagine
description: A colorful and healthy vegetarian tagine featuring seasonal vegetables slow-cooked with Moroccan spices.
descriptionAr: طاجين نباتي ملون وصحي يضم خضروات موسمية مطبوخة ببطء مع التوابل المغربية.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a tagine over medium heat.
Layer vegetables starting with onions, then carrots, eggplant, zucchini, and peppers.
Add tomatoes, garlic, and chickpeas on top.
Sprinkle all spices evenly over the vegetables.
Add 1/2 cup water, cover, and simmer for 40 minutes.
Check occasionally and add more water if needed.
Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.
Serve with couscous or crusty bread.

title: Seafood Tagine
description: A fragrant seafood tagine with shrimp, fish, and mussels in a spicy tomato and pepper sauce.
descriptionAr: طاجين فواكه بحرية عطري مع الروبيان والسمك وبلح البحر في صلصة الطماطم والفلفل الحارة.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a tagine over medium heat.
Sauté onions and garlic until softened, about 3 minutes.
Add bell peppers and tomatoes, cook for 5 minutes.
Add paprika, cumin, harissa, and salt.
Add fish cubes and cook for 5 minutes.
Add shrimp and mussels, cover and cook for 10 minutes.
Drizzle with lemon juice and garnish with cilantro.
Serve immediately with crusty bread.

title: Chickpea and Spinach Tagine
description: A hearty vegetarian tagine with chickpeas, spinach, and tomatoes. Protein-rich and full of flavor.
descriptionAr: طاجين نباتي دسم مع الحمص والسبانخ والطماطم. غني بالبروتين ومليء بالنكهة.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a tagine over medium heat.
Sauté onions and garlic until soft, about 5 minutes.
Add tomatoes and cook for 3 minutes.
Add chickpeas and all spices, stir well.
Pour in vegetable broth and simmer for 15 minutes.
Add spinach and cook until wilted, about 5 minutes.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot.

title: Lamb Tagine with Apricots
description: Sweet and savory lamb tagine with dried apricots, honey, and almonds. A festive dish perfect for special occasions.
descriptionAr: طاجين لحم حلو ومالح بالمشمش المجفف والعسل واللوز. طبق احتفالي مثالي للمناسبات الخاصة.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a tagine over medium-high heat.
Brown lamb cubes on all sides, about 8 minutes.
Add onions and cook until softened.
Add spices and stir to coat the meat.
Pour in broth, cover, and simmer for 1.5 hours.
Add apricots and honey, cook for 30 more minutes.
Toast almonds in a dry pan until golden.
Garnish with almonds and sesame seeds before serving.

title: Zaalouk (Eggplant Salad)
description: A smoky Moroccan eggplant and tomato salad with garlic and spices. Served as a dip or side dish.
descriptionAr: سلطة مغربية مدخنة من الباذنجان والطماطم مع الثوم والتوابل. تقدم كمقبلات أو طبق جانبي.
instructions: Prick eggplants with a fork and roast at 200°C for 30 minutes until soft.
Let cool, then peel and chop the flesh.
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and tomatoes, cook for 10 minutes.
Add eggplant and all spices.
Mash everything together while cooking for 15 minutes.
Stir in lemon juice and fresh herbs.
Serve warm or cold with bread.

title: Taktouka (Pepper and Tomato Salad)
description: A refreshing salad of roasted peppers and tomatoes with garlic and cumin. Perfect as a starter or side.
descriptionAr: سلطة منعشة من الفلفل المحمص والطماطم مع الثوم والكمون. مثالية كمقبلات أو طبق جانبي.
instructions: Roast peppers over flame or under broiler until charred.
Place in a covered bowl to steam, then peel and chop.
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft, about 10 minutes.
Add roasted peppers and spices.
Cook for 10 more minutes, mashing slightly.
Garnish with cilantro and serve.

title: Briwat (Sweet Almond Pastries)
description: Crispy triangular pastries filled with sweet almond paste, flavored with orange blossom water and cinnamon.
descriptionAr: معجنات مثلثة مقرمشة محشوة بعجينة اللوز الحلوة، منكهة بماء الزهر والقرفة.
instructions: Mix ground almonds, sugar, cinnamon, orange blossom water, and egg white to form a paste.
Cut phyllo sheets into 10cm wide strips.
Brush each strip with melted butter.
Place a teaspoon of almond mixture at one end.
Fold into triangles like a flag.
Seal edges with butter.
Fry in hot oil until golden brown.
Drizzle with honey while warm.

title: Chebakia (Sesame Cookies)
description: Flower-shaped sesame cookies soaked in honey and orange blossom water. A traditional Ramadan treat.
descriptionAr: بسكويت على شكل زهرة بالسمسم منقوع في العسل وماء الزهر. حلوى تقليدية في رمضان.
instructions: Mix flour, sesame seeds, anise, cinnamon, and saffron.
Add butter, orange blossom water, vinegar, and egg.
Add water gradually to form a firm dough.
Knead well and let rest for 30 minutes.
Roll out dough thinly and cut into rectangles.
Make 4 slits in each rectangle.
Thread through to create flower shape.
Fry until golden brown.
Dip in warm honey immediately.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds.

title: Couscous Royal
description: The ultimate Moroccan feast featuring steamed couscous topped with lamb, chicken, merguez sausages, and seven vegetables.
descriptionAr: وليمة مغربية نهائية تضم كسcousمطهو على البخار مع لحم الخروف والدجاج والمرقاز وسبع خضروات.
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil and brown lamb and chicken.
Add onions, spices, and cover with water. Simmer for 1 hour.
Add carrots, turnips, and cabbage. Cook for 30 minutes.
Add zucchini, tomatoes, and chickpeas. Cook for 20 minutes.
Steam couscous over the broth for 20 minutes, fluffing occasionally.
Grill merguez sausages until cooked through.
Pile couscous on a large platter, make a well in center.
Arrange meats and vegetables over couscous.
Serve with broth and harissa on the side.

title: Vegetable Couscous
description: A lighter vegetarian version of the classic Moroccan dish, featuring seasonal vegetables and aromatic spices.
descriptionAr: نسخة نباتية أخف من الطبق المغربي الكلاسيكي، تضم خضروات موسمية وتوابل عطرية.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Sauté onions until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add spices and stir for 1 minute.
Add carrots, turnips, and cabbage. Stir to coat with spices.
Pour in vegetable broth and bring to boil.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 45 minutes.
Add zucchini, tomatoes, and chickpeas. Cook for 20 minutes.
Steam couscous according to package instructions.
Fluff couscous with a fork and place on serving platter.
Top with vegetables and broth. Garnish with cilantro.

title: Harira Soup
description: A hearty Moroccan soup with tomatoes, lentils, chickpeas, and vermicelli. Traditionally served during Ramadan.
descriptionAr: شوربة مغربية دسمة بالطماطم والعدس والحمص والشعيرية. تقدم تقليدياً في رمضان.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Brown meat cubes on all sides.
Add onions and celery, cook until softened.
Add spices, tomato paste, and crushed tomatoes.
Add 8 cups water and bring to boil.
Add chickpeas and lentils, simmer for 45 minutes.
Mix flour with water to make a slurry.
Stir slurry into soup to thicken slightly.
Add vermicelli and cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in lemon juice and fresh herbs.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with dates.

title: Bissara (Fava Bean Soup)
description: A comforting split fava bean soup topped with olive oil and cumin. Popular as a breakfast or light meal.
descriptionAr: شوربة مريحة من الفول المقسم مغطاة بزيت الزيتون والكمون. شائعة كإفطار أو وجبة خفيفة.
instructions: Rinse fava beans and place in a large pot.
Add water and bring to boil. Skim off any foam.
Reduce heat and simmer for 1 hour until beans are soft.
Add garlic, olive oil, and spices.
Cook for 15 more minutes.
Blend with immersion blender until smooth.
Adjust seasoning with salt.
Serve hot drizzled with olive oil and extra cumin.
Enjoy with crusty bread.

title: Moroccan Mint Tea
description: The national drink of Morocco. Sweet green tea infused with fresh mint, poured from a height to create froth.
descriptionAr: المشروب الوطني في المغرب. شاي أخضر حلو منقوع بالنعناع الطازج، يُسكب من ارتفاع لتكوين رغوة.
instructions: Rinse the teapot with hot water.
Add green tea leaves and a splash of boiling water.
Swirl and discard water to wash the tea.
Add the bunch of fresh mint to the pot.
Pour in boiling water.
Add sugar and stir gently.
Let steep for 5 minutes.
Pour into glasses from a height to create froth.
Serve immediately.

title: Khobz (Moroccan Bread)
description: Round, hearty Moroccan bread with a crispy crust and soft interior. Essential for scooping up tagines and dips.
descriptionAr: خبز مغربي مستدير دسم بقشرة مقرمشة وداخل ناعم. ضروري لتناول الطواجن والمقبلات.
instructions: Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water. Let bloom for 5 minutes.
Mix flour and salt in a large bowl.
Make a well and pour in yeast mixture.
Knead for 10 minutes until smooth and elastic.
Cover and let rise in warm place for 1 hour.
Punch down dough and divide into 2 portions.
Shape into round loaves about 20cm diameter.
Place on cornmeal-dusted baking sheet.
Cover and let rise for 30 minutes.
Preheat oven to 220°C.
Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden brown.
Cool on wire rack before serving.

title: Msemmen (Moroccan Pancakes)
description: Flaky, layered Moroccan pancakes made by folding dough with butter and oil. Perfect for breakfast with honey.
descriptionAr: فطائر مغربية رقائقية متعددة الطبقات مصنوعة بطي العجينة مع الزبدة والزيت. مثالية للإفطار بالعسل.
instructions: Mix flour, semolina, salt, sugar, and yeast.
Add warm water gradually to form soft dough.
Knead for 10 minutes until smooth.
Cover and let rest for 30 minutes.
Divide dough into 8 balls.
Oil work surface and hands generously.
Flatten each ball and stretch very thin.
Fold corners to center creating layers.
Heat griddle over medium heat.
Cook each pancake for 3-4 minutes per side.
Serve hot drizzled with honey.

title: Baghrir (Thousand Hole Pancakes)
description: Spongy Moroccan pancakes with a unique honeycomb texture. Cooked on one side only and served with butter and honey.
descriptionAr: فطائر مغربية إسفنجية بملمس خلية النحل الفريد. تُطهى من جهة واحدة فقط وتُقدم مع الزبدة والعسل.
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender for 2 minutes.
Let batter rest for 10 minutes.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour ladle of batter without spreading.
Cook until surface is dry and full of holes.
Do not flip - cook one side only.
Repeat with remaining batter.
Serve warm with butter and honey.

title: Harsha (Semolina Flatbread)
description: Golden semolina flatbread with a crumbly texture, often served with cheese, honey, or jam for breakfast.
descriptionAr: خبز مسطح من السميد بلون ذهبي وملمس متفتت، غالباً ما يُقدم مع الجبن أو العسل أو المربى للإفطار.
instructions: Mix semolina, baking powder, and salt.
Add melted butter and rub into semolina.
Gradually add milk to form soft dough.
Knead lightly until smooth.
Divide into 6 portions.
Pat each into a flat round about 1cm thick.
Heat butter in a skillet over medium-low heat.
Cook each bread for 5 minutes per side until golden.
Serve warm with cheese, honey, or jam.

title: Rfissa (Shredded Pancake with Chicken)
description: A festive dish of shredded msemmen pancakes topped with chicken, lentils, and fenugreek sauce. Traditionally served after childbirth.
descriptionAr: طبق احتفالي من فطائر مسمن مبشورة مع الدجاج والعدس وصلصة الحلبة. يُقدم تقليدياً بعد الولادة.
instructions: Soak fenugreek seeds overnight, drain.
Heat oil in a large pot and brown chicken.
Add onions, garlic, and spices. Cook 5 minutes.
Add water to cover and bring to boil.
Add lentils and fenugreek. Simmer for 1 hour.
Shred msemmen pancakes into a serving dish.
Arrange chicken over shredded pancakes.
Ladle sauce and lentils over top.
Garnish with toasted almonds.
Serve immediately while hot.

title: Mechoui (Roasted Lamb)
description: Whole roasted lamb or lamb shoulder rubbed with spices and slow-roasted until meltingly tender. A celebration centerpiece.
descriptionAr: خروف كامل مشوي أو كتف خروف مفرك بالتوابل ومحمر ببطء حتى يصبح طرياً جداً. قطعة مركزية للاحتفالات.
instructions: Preheat oven to 150°C.
Mix butter with all spices and garlic.
Make slits in the lamb and rub spice butter all over.
Season generously with salt and pepper.
Place in roasting pan with water.
Cover tightly with foil.
Roast for 3.5 to 4 hours until very tender.
Remove foil and increase heat to 200°C.
Roast 20 more minutes to crisp the skin.
Let rest 15 minutes before serving.
Serve with bread and cumin salt.

title: Brochettes (Grilled Kebabs)
description: Marinated beef or lamb skewers grilled over charcoal. A street food favorite served with bread and harissa.
descriptionAr: أسياخ لحم متبلة مشوية على الفحم. طعام شعبي مفضل يُقدم مع الخبز والهريسة.
ingredients: 500g lamb or beef, cut into cubes
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Mix oil, lemon juice, garlic, and spices.
Add meat cubes and marinate for 2 hours or overnight.
Thread meat onto skewers alternating with onion.
Preheat grill to high heat.
Grill skewers for 3-4 minutes per side.
Meat should be charred outside and pink inside.
Serve hot with bread and harissa.

title: Pastilla (Chicken Bastilla)
description: An elaborate sweet and savory pie with layers of crispy pastry, spiced chicken, and almonds dusted with cinnamon and sugar.
descriptionAr: فطيرة مفصلة حلوة ومالحة بطبقات من العجين المقرمش والدجاج المتبل واللوز مرشوشة بالقرفة والسكر.
ingredients: Powdered sugar and cinnamon for dusting
instructions: Poach chicken with onions, herbs, and spices until tender.
Remove chicken, reduce broth by half.
Shred chicken meat and remove bones.
Fry almonds until golden, then grind coarsely.
Mix almonds with 2 tbsp sugar and 1/2 tsp cinnamon.
Add beaten eggs to reduced broth, cook until scrambled.
Brush a round pan with butter.
Layer 6 sheets of warqa overlapping.
Spread almond mixture on bottom.
Add chicken layer, then egg layer.
Fold overhanging pastry to cover.
Top with remaining sheets.
Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes until golden.
Dust with powdered sugar and cinnamon pattern.

title: Chermoula Fish
description: Fresh fish marinated in chermoula - a zesty blend of herbs, garlic, and spices - then pan-fried or grilled.
descriptionAr: سمك طازج متبل بالشرمولة - مزيج من الأعشاب والثوم والتوابل - ثم مقلي أو مشوي.
ingredients: 4 fish fillets (sea bass, red snapper, or tilapia)
instructions: Blend cilantro, parsley, garlic, and spices into a paste.
Add lemon juice and olive oil.
Coat fish fillets with chermoula marinade.
Marinate for 30 minutes to 2 hours.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high.
Cook fish 4-5 minutes per side until flaky.
Serve with lemon wedges and salad.

title: Tanjia (Marrakech Slow-Cooked Meat)
description: A Marrakech specialty of beef slow-cooked in a clay urn with preserved lemon, garlic, and spices. Traditionally cooked in hammam ashes.
descriptionAr: تخصص مراكش من اللحم المطبوخ ببطء في إناء فخاري بالحامض المسكر والثوم والتوابل. يُطهى تقليدياً في رماد الحمام.
instructions: Place meat in a tanjia or oven-safe pot.
Add all remaining ingredients.
Cover with water just to cover meat.
Seal the pot tightly.
Cook at 150°C for 3 hours.
Meat should be fork-tender.
Serve with crusty bread to soak up sauce.

title: Moroccan Carrot Salad
description: Tender cooked carrots tossed with cumin, garlic, and lemon. A vibrant side dish served cold or at room temperature.
descriptionAr: جزر طري مطبوخ مع الكمون والثوم والليمون. طبق جانبي نابض بالحياة يُقدم باردًا أو بدرجة حرارة الغرفة.
instructions: Boil carrots until tender, about 10 minutes.
Drain and let cool slightly.
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Sauté garlic for 1 minute.
Add carrots and spices.
Toss to coat well and cook for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and add lemon juice.
Garnish with parsley.
Serve at room temperature or chilled.

title: Moroccan Beet Salad
description: Earthy roasted beets tossed with cumin, garlic, and vinegar. A colorful addition to any Moroccan meal.
descriptionAr: شمندر محمص ترابي مع الكمون والثوم والخل. إضافة ملونة لأي وجبة مغربية.
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C.
Wrap beets in foil and roast for 45 minutes.
Let cool, then peel and dice.
Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
Sauté garlic for 30 seconds.
Add beets and cumin, toss to combine.
Cook for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and add vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with parsley before serving.

title: Chickpea and Tomato Salad
description: A refreshing salad of chickpeas, tomatoes, onions, and herbs with a zesty lemon dressing.
descriptionAr: سلطة منعشة من الحمص والطماطم والبصل والأعشاب مع تتبيلة الليمون النشطة.
instructions: Combine chickpeas, tomatoes, cucumber, and onion in a bowl.
Add fresh herbs.
In a small bowl, whisk oil, lemon juice, and cumin.
Pour dressing over salad and toss well.
Season with salt and pepper.
Let sit for 15 minutes for flavors to meld.
Serve at room temperature.

title: Cornes de Gazelle (Gazelle Horns)
description: Elegant crescent-shaped pastries filled with fragrant almond paste. A classic Moroccan wedding cookie.
descriptionAr: معجنات على شكل هلال أنيقة محشوة بعجينة اللوز العطرة. بسكويت كلاسيكي للأعراس المغربية.
instructions: Mix almonds, sugar, cinnamon, orange blossom water, and egg white for filling.
Knead until smooth and set aside.
For dough, mix flour and salt.
Rub in butter until crumbly.
Add egg yolk and orange juice to form dough.
Roll dough thinly on floured surface.
Cut into 8cm circles.
Place teaspoon of filling on each circle.
Fold into crescent shape, sealing edges.
Curve ends slightly to form horn shape.
Bake at 180°C for 12-15 minutes.
Cool and dust with powdered sugar.

title: Ghriba (Almond Cookies)
description: Chewy almond cookies with a cracked surface. These gluten-free treats are flavored with lemon and orange blossom.
descriptionAr: بسكويت لوز مضغي بسطح متشقق. هذه الحلويات الخالية من الغلوتين منكهة بالليمون وماء الزهر.
instructions: Mix ground almonds and powdered sugar.
Add eggs, orange blossom water, and lemon zest.
Add baking powder and mix well.
Let dough rest for 30 minutes.
Preheat oven to 160°C.
Form dough into walnut-sized balls.
Roll generously in powdered sugar.
Place on lined baking sheet, spaced apart.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until cracked and golden.
Cool on wire rack.

title: Sfouf (Turmeric Cake)
description: A simple semolina cake flavored with turmeric and anise. Cut into diamonds and topped with pine nuts.
descriptionAr: كعكة سميد بسيطة منكهة بالكركم واليانسون. تُقطع إلى معينات وتُزين بصنوبر.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease a 9x13 inch pan.
Mix semolina, flour, sugar, turmeric, anise, and baking powder.
Add oil and milk, stir until combined.
Pour batter into prepared pan.
Decorate top with pine nuts in rows.
Bake for 25-30 minutes until golden.
Cut into diamond shapes while warm.
Let cool completely before serving.

title: Sellou (Toasted Flour and Nut Mix)
description: A rich, unbaked mixture of toasted flour, almonds, and sesame bound with honey and butter. Served during Ramadan and celebrations.
descriptionAr: مزيج غني غير مخبوز من الطحين المحمص واللوز والسمسم مربوط بالعسل والزبدة. يُقدم في رمضان والاحتفالات.
instructions: Toast flour in a dry pan over low heat until golden brown, stirring constantly.
Toast almonds and sesame seeds separately.
Grind almonds coarsely.
Mix toasted flour, ground almonds, sesame, sugar, anise, cinnamon, and mastic.
Melt butter with oil and honey.
Pour warm mixture over dry ingredients.
Mix well until everything is coated.
Press firmly into a serving dish.
Decorate with whole almonds.
Serve at room temperature.

title: Krachel (Anise and Sesame Rolls)
description: Sweet breakfast rolls scented with anise and topped with sesame seeds. Perfect with butter and honey.
descriptionAr: لفائف إفطار حلوة معطرة باليانسون ومزينة ببذور السمسم. مثالية مع الزبدة والعسل.
instructions: Dissolve yeast in warm water with a pinch of sugar.
Mix flour, sugar, anise seeds, and salt.
Add yeast mixture, milk, oil, and egg.
Knead until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes.
Cover and let rise for 1 hour.
Divide dough into 12 pieces.
Roll each into a small baguette shape.
Place on lined baking sheet.
Cover and let rise 30 minutes.
Brush with egg yolk and sprinkle with sesame.
Bake at 180°C for 18-20 minutes until golden.

title: Meloui (Layered Pancakes)
description: Round, flaky pancakes similar to msemmen but shaped into spirals. A beloved breakfast and tea time treat.
descriptionAr: فطائر رقائقية مستديرة تشبه المسمن لكن على شكل حلزونات. حلوى إفطار وشاي محبوبة.
instructions: Mix flour, semolina, salt, sugar, and yeast.
Add warm water to form soft dough.
Knead for 10 minutes until smooth.
Let rest for 30 minutes.
Divide into 8 balls.
Oil surface and hands well.
Flatten and stretch dough into very thin circle.
Brush with butter-oil mixture.
Roll into a log, then coil into spiral.
Flatten gently and cook on griddle.
Serve hot with butter and honey.

title: Mini Chicken Pastillas
description: Individual-sized sweet and savory chicken pastries perfect for parties or appetizers.
descriptionAr: معجنات دجاج فردية حلوة ومالحة مثالية للحفلات أو المقبلات.
ingredients: Powdered sugar and cinnamon for dusting
instructions: Sauté onion until soft, add spices.
Mix in shredded chicken and parsley.
Add scrambled eggs and mix well.
Combine almonds with sugar and cinnamon.
Cut phyllo into squares for individual portions.
Layer 3 squares per pastilla, brushing with butter.
Place chicken mixture and almond mixture.
Fold into packets, sealing edges.
Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes.
Dust with powdered sugar and cinnamon.

title: Lamb Tagine with Prunes
description: Succulent lamb slow-cooked with sweet prunes, caramelized onions, and fried almonds. A perfect balance of sweet and savory.
descriptionAr: لحم خروف طري مطبوخ ببطء مع البرقوق الحلو والبصل المكرمل واللوز المقلي. توازن مثالي بين الحلو والمالح.
instructions: Heat olive oil in tagine over medium-high heat.
Brown lamb cubes on all sides.
Add onions and cook until golden.
Add spices and stir to coat.
Pour in broth, cover, and simmer 1.5 hours.
Add prunes and honey, cook 30 more minutes.
Meat should be fork-tender.
Garnish with fried almonds and sesame seeds.
Serve with crusty bread.

title: Fish Tagine with Potatoes
description: White fish fillets cooked with potatoes, tomatoes, and green olives in a flavorful chermoula sauce.
descriptionAr: شرائح سمك أبيض مطبوخة مع البطاطس والطماطم والزيتون الأخضر في صلصة الشرمولة النكهية.
instructions: Mix garlic, cilantro, spices, and lemon juice for chermoula.
Rub half the chermoula on fish fillets.
Layer potatoes and onions in tagine.
Drizzle with remaining chermoula.
Add tomato slices and olives.
Place fish on top.
Add 1/2 cup water.
Cover and simmer for 30 minutes.
Serve with lemon wedges.

title: Vegetarian Harira
description: A hearty meatless version of the classic soup, packed with lentils, chickpeas, and vegetables.
descriptionAr: نسخة نباتية دسمة من الشوربة الكلاسيكية، محشوة بالعدس والحمص والخضروات.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot.
Sauté onions, carrots, and celery until soft.
Add spices and tomato paste, stir for 1 minute.
Add tomatoes, chickpeas, lentils, and 6 cups water.
Bring to boil, then simmer 40 minutes.
Mix flour with water to make slurry.
Add slurry to soup to thicken.
Add vermicelli and cook 5 minutes.
Stir in fresh herbs and lemon juice.
Serve hot with bread.

title: Moroccan Vermicelli Soup
description: A light, comforting soup with toasted vermicelli in a fragrant tomato and herb broth.
descriptionAr: شوربة خفيفة ومريحة مع الشعيرية المحمصة في مرق الطماطم والأعشاب العطرة.
instructions: Toast vermicelli in a dry pan until golden.
Heat oil in a pot over medium heat.
Sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add spices and cook for 1 minute.
Add tomatoes and broth, bring to boil.
Add toasted vermicelli.
Simmer for 15 minutes until pasta is tender.
Stir in fresh cilantro.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot.

title: Moroccan Almond and Date Smoothie
description: A nourishing blend of almonds, dates, and milk flavored with orange blossom water. A refreshing and energy-boosting drink.
descriptionAr: مزيج مغذ من اللوز والتمر والحليب منكه بماء الزهر. مشروب منعش ومنشط للطاقة.
instructions: Soak almonds in hot water for 10 minutes, then peel.
Place almonds, dates, milk, and water in blender.
Blend on high speed for 2 minutes until smooth.
Add orange blossom water and cinnamon.
Blend for 30 more seconds.
Strain through fine mesh if desired.
Serve over ice with a sprinkle of cinnamon.
Add honey if extra sweetness is needed.
